Debugging

Debugmode is intended for giving insight into the dataflow and activateing swac to detect possible errorsources in the useage. Each component can have it's own debug information printed. Debugmode does not affect critical errors, these are always printed to console.

Activateing debugmode

Single call activateing debugmode

If you want to activate the debugmode only for one page call, you can use the parameter debugmode=true in the url of the page.

            http://localhost:8080/SWAC/sites/sourcebinding.html?id=1&debugmode=true

Genneral activateing debugmode

To activate the debugmode simply add the following line of code into the configuration.js file on rootlevel of your application. This entry is allready there if you use the configuration template.

DEV NOTE: Until SWAC leafes alpha stage, debugmode is allways set to true, but can be deactivated over the configuration.

            SWAC_config.debugmode = true;

Debugging URL parameters

The following table lists all URL parameters generally useable for debugging suposes. They are useable without setting debugmode=true in configuration.
ParameterValueExplanation
cleardatasourcestatestrueResets the syncstate cache. Those prevents requests for data that was previous known as not available.
clearlocalstoragetrueClears the local storage for all resources requested by the current pageload.

Devhelper

If debugmode is activated the Devhelper component is automatically activated. It enables a toolbar that is able to give you a look inside what is googing on in a component.
By hovering over a component a smal icon is displayed in a corner. This icon indicates the state of the component. With a single click on this icon the Devhelper toolbar is activated and shows errors, informations and hints.
